Government
==========

9

1

2

2

1. #### [Redistricting](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/1348/Redistricting)
2. #### [State of the City](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/1347/State-of-the-City)
3. #### [Agendas, Minutes & Videos](https://missouricitytx.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingTypeList.aspx)

   Visit the Agenda Portal to view meeting information regarding City Council and all other Boards, Committees and Commissions.
4. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://missouricitytx.civicweb.net/Portal/MeetingTypeList.aspx)

   Search through the city's many volunteer- and elected official-based boards and commissions.
5. #### [City Administration](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/383/City-Administration)

   Find out how the day-to-day operations of Missouri City are run.

1. #### [City Council](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/183/City-Council)

   Learn about the governing process and how the Missouri City Council is working to encourage growth and economic prosperity while maintaining the community's long history of value-based ideals.
2. #### [City Overview](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/189/City-Overview)

   View demographic information for the City of Missouri City.
3. #### [City Recognition & Achievements](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/188/City-Recognition-Achievements)

   View city accolades and achievements since 2008.
4. #### [MuniCode](https://library.municode.com/tx/missouri_city/codes/code_of_ordinances)

   Access the Missouri City Code of Ordinances to learn more about the local government and its regulations.
5. #### [Online City Services](https://www.missouricitytx.gov/192/Online-City-Services)

   Use this quick-find guide for online services.

### Contact Us

1. **City of Missouri City**
2. 1522 Texas Parkway
3. Missouri City, TX 77489
4. Phone: [281-403-8500](tel:2814038500)
5. Hours: Monday through Friday
6. 8 am to 5 pm
